content: I cannot predict the future actions of streaming platforms, but it's highly possible that other streaming platforms will follow netflix's lead in adapting to changing consumer trends and preferences. the success of netflix has shown the viability and profitability of online streaming, and it has prompted major media companies to start their own streaming services, such as disney+, hulu, hbo max, and amazon prime video. these services aim to compete with netflix by providing exclusive content and improving the user experience, which could potentially revolutionize the film industry even more in the future.
